solution_line_template: The total amount Tanya spent on face moisturizers is {price_per_face_moisturizer}*{num_face_moisturizers} = $<<{price_per_face_moisturizer}*{num_face_moisturizers}={tanya_face_total}>>{tanya_face_total}
If she bought four body lotions, the total cost is {num_body_lotions}*{price_per_body_lotion} = $<<{num_body_lotions}*{price_per_body_lotion}={tanya_body_total}>>{tanya_body_total}
Tanya spent a total of {tanya_body_total}+{tanya_face_total} = $<<{tanya_body_total}+{tanya_face_total}={tanya_total}>>{tanya_total} in the store.
If Christy spent twice this amount, the total was {christy_multiplier}*{tanya_total} = $ {christy_total}
The total amount of money they both spent is {christy_total}+{tanya_total} = <<{christy_total}+{tanya_total}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}$
